name: Reaction Roles
description: Allow server members to react to messages to receive roles and profiles.

params.channel: The channel to send the reaction role message in
params.emoji: The emoji that users react to for the specified role.

embed.description: React with {emoji} to get the {role_mention} role!

errors.InvalidEmoji: The emoji {emoji} is not an emoji that can be used.
errors.InvalidRole: The role {role_mention} is not a valid role that can be assigned.
errors.RoleError: The role "{role}" was not found in this server.
